attributes.action: Remove gcses for years 2021 and 2022 due to covid 19 learning restrictions
attributes.additional_details: The government has already decided that cancelling the 2020 series of exams for current year 11 students is an appropriate solution I think that it would only be fair to do the same for year 10 and 12 students as they are going to miss out on learning. I believe that in order to make it fair for students set to take their exams in 2021 and 2022 teachers should give students grades based on these internal assessments.
attributes.background: We urge the UK government to use teacher expected grades as Covid 19 has severely disrupted learning.
